author: trawick
msg: mod_cgid: fix a hash table corruption problem which could
result in the wrong script being cleaned up at the end of a
Unique storage was not used for the key, as the code assumed
incorrectly that apr_hash_set() made a copy of the key.  Thus,
when the script pid was looked up at the end of the request,
some other script's pid could be found.

author: stas
msg: fix t/request.t to get /index.html, instead of / since not everybody

author: joes
msg: Rework build system around ap[ru]-config to allow apr & apr-utils to have non-httpd install locations.
